# Setup

```{r packages}
sapply(list("sf", "tidyverse", "raster", "ows4R"), 
       library, character.only = TRUE, logical.return = TRUE)

source(here("R", "download_fisbroker_metadata.R"))
```


# Data

```{r data}
temp_04 <- raster(here("data-raw", "berlin", "climate_model_berlin_04h_2016_25833", "t2m04h", "t2m04h.tif"))

crs(temp_04) <- st_crs(25833)$proj4string

dummy_ras <- raster(here("data-proc", "berlin", 
                                   "dummy_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035",
                                   "dummy_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035.tif"))

temp_04_3035 <- projectRaster(temp_04, dummy_ras)

temp_04_3035_res <- resample(temp_04_3035, dummy_ras)

create_meta_raster(file = temp_04_3035_res,
                   name = "climate_model_berlin_04h",
                   epsg = "3035",
                   date = "2016",
                   units = "Â°C in 2 m height",
                   descr = "reprojected to 3035 and resampled",
                   source = here("data-raw", "berlin", "climate_model_berlin_04h_2016_25833", "t2m04h", "t2m04h.tif"),
                   d_down = NA,
                   mod = "reprojected to 3035 and resampled",
                   path = "data-proc/berlin",
                   folder = TRUE)

writeRaster(temp_04_3035_res, here("data-proc", "berlin", "climate_model_berlin_04h_2016_3035", "climate_model_berlin_04h_2016_3035.tif"))

```
